manifest.name: @wry/context
manifest.description: Manage contextual information needed by (a)synchronous tasks without explicitly passing objects around

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tsc && npm run rollup
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run mocha

manifest.readme:
# @wry/context

Manage contextual information needed by synchronous or asynchronous
tasks without explicitly passing objects around.
